metadata.title: CVE-2021-47319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:virtio-blk: Fix memory leak among suspend/resume procedure The vblk->vqsshould be freed before we call init_vqs() in virtblk_restore().

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
